remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級的應用程式中使用此控制項，可繼續使用`ADO`資料連接。Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection. 新的程式開發，您應該考慮使用`ADO.NET`而不是`ADO`。For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 比較的 ADO.NET 和 ADO](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/904fck4k(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/904fck4k(v=vs.90)). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BOF`和傳回這個指標是否有效，值目前的資料列指標的位置所決定。The `BOF` and return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid. 如果有任一`BOF`或是`true`，沒有任何目前的資料列，且參考的任何嘗試資料會導致例外狀況。If either `BOF` or is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference data causes an exception. 您可以使用`BOF`並屬性，以決定是否物件包含的資料列，或是您已經看超過限制的逐列移動。You can use the `BOF` and properties to determine whether an object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an as you move from row to row. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 取得或設定目前 在本機記憶體中快取的資料錄數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current .

value.span: ，指定目前 物件在本機記憶體中快取的資料錄數目。

span.span: An that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current object.
The default is 50 records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CacheSize`值會指示提供者將保留在其緩衝區，一次提取至本機記憶體的多少筆記錄的記錄數目。The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory. 例如，當設定為 10，開啟第一個之後，提供者擷取的前 10 筆記錄到本機的記憶體。For example, when set to 10, after opening the first , the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory. 因此，當您繼續從目前的記錄時，提供者會從本機記憶體緩衝區傳回的資料值。Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer. 當您移動超過最後一筆記錄，接下來 10 記錄擷取從資料來源到快取。As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache. 雖然您可以變更值的資料指標存留期間，變更只會快取中的記錄數目影響之後的下一個提取從資料來源。While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放這個控制項所參考之任何 managed 物件所持有的所有資源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和`EOF`傳回這個指標是否有效，值目前的資料列指標的位置所決定。The and `EOF` return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid. 如果有任一或`EOF`是`true`，沒有任何目前的資料列，且參考的任何嘗試資料會導致例外狀況。If either or `EOF` is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference data causes an exception. 您可以使用並`EOF`屬性，以決定是否物件包含的資料列，或是您已經看超過限制的逐列移動。You can use the and `EOF` properties to determine whether an object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an as you move from row to row. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
